text: Igor Matovič (born 11 May 1973) is a Slovak politician. Matovič was the Prime Minister of Slovakia from 2020 until 2021. He is a member of the Ordinary People. In 2010, he was elected as a member of the National Council. Matovič was born in Trnava, Czechoslovakia . Matovič's party won the majority of votes in the 2020 Slovak parliamentary election on 29 February 2020, winning 53 seats in the 150-member National Council with 25.02% of the vote. On 13 March, Matovič announced he had reached an agreement for a governing coalition for a new cabinet to form. Matovič was sworn in Prime Minister on 21 March. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Slovakia
title: Igor Matovič
